channel.title: Commands I know are right get errors?

item.title: Commands I know are right get errors?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:450127”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=553026.msg4052156#msg4052156 date=1342626687]

    public void lowDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
}
    public void mediumDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
                        }
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("mdshop")) {
				c.getShops().openShop(8);
				c.sendMessage("You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
					return;
			}
                       }
}
    public void highDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("mdshop")) {
				c.getShops().openShop(8);
				c.sendMessage("You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
					return;
			}

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("hdshop")) {
				c.getShops().openShop(9);
				c.sendMessage("You open the high donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
}

so many unneeded brackets
[/quote]
Oh. Can you point me out one?[/quote]

the code i posted should be the fixed version

Read full topic
item.source: Commands I know are right get errors?

item.title: Commands I know are right get errors?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:2, topic:450127”][code=java]
public void lowDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
			c.getShops().openShop(7);
			c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
			} else {
			if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
		return;
			}
		}

}
public void mediumDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“ldshop”) ) {
c.getShops().openShop(7);
c.sendMessage(“You open the low donator shop from mystical air!”);
} else {
if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t do this command in the wilderness!”);
return;
}
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“mdshop”)) {
c.getShops().openShop(8);
c.sendMessage(“You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!”);
} else {
if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
return;
}
}
}
public void highDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“ldshop”) ) {
c.getShops().openShop(7);
c.sendMessage(“You open the low donator shop from mystical air!”);
} else {
if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You can’t do this command in the wilderness!”);
return;
}
}
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“mdshop”)) {
c.getShops().openShop(8);
c.sendMessage(“You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!”);
} else {
if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
return;
}

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("hdshop")) {
			c.getShops().openShop(9);
			c.sendMessage("You open the high donator shop from mystical air!");
			} else {
			if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
		return;
			}
		}

}
[/code]

so many unneeded brackets[/quote]
Oh. Can you point me out one?

@n10si_t wrote:

item.title: Commands I know are right get errors?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I added new voids to Command.java. lowDonator, mediumDonator, and highDonator. I add commands in them but I get errors.

Here’s the code:

    public void lowDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
			}
}
    public void mediumDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
			}
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("mdshop")) {
				c.getShops().openShop(8);
				c.sendMessage("You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
					return;
			}
			}

}

    public void highDonatorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
    {
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("ldshop") ) {
				c.getShops().openShop(7);
				c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
			}
			if (playerCommand.startsWith("mdshop")) {
				c.getShops().openShop(8);
				c.sendMessage("You open the medium donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
					return;
			}
			}

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("hdshop")) {
				c.getShops().openShop(9);
				c.sendMessage("You open the high donator shop from mystical air!");
				} else {
				if(c.inWild() && c.isDonator == 0) {
				c.sendMessage("You can't do this command in the wilderness!");
			return;
				}
			}
}

Errors:

enum expected

           ^

enum expected
                                c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop fro
m mystical air!");
                                ^

enum expected

                                ^

enum expected

           ^

                                c.sendMessage("You open the low donator shop fro
